TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AssociatedMetadataProvider extends System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelMetadataProvider
Public MustInherit Class AssociatedMetadataProvider Inherits ModelMetadataProvider

summary.span: 提供抽象類別來實作中繼資料提供者。

span.span: Provides an abstract class to implement a metadata provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中繼資料提供者提供之模型中繼資料。A metadata provider provides metadata for a model. 中繼資料提供者必須衍生自。Metadata providers must derive from . 如果您想要使用自訂驗證程式或協力廠商驗證程式會使用以屬性為基礎的中繼資料，您可以繼承自這個類別。You can inherit from this class if you want to use a custom validator or a third-party validator that uses attribute-based metadata. 這個類別會實作的抽象方法類別，並包含額外的抽象方法。This class implements the abstract methods of the class and contains additional abstract methods. 當您實作這個類別時，使用類別來實作驗證程式。When you implement this class, use the class to implement the validator. 鬆散耦合模型提供者類別和驗證程式提供者類別。Model provider classes and validator provider classes are loosely coupled. 因此，它們會獨立運作，而且彼此沒有任何相依性。Therefore, they work independently and have no dependencies on each other. 不過，中繼資料提供者會公開可存取及驗證提供者所用的中繼資料。However, the metadata provider exposes metadata that can be accessed and used by validation providers. 例如，預設中繼資料提供者 (類別) 會讀取物件的顯示名稱。For example, the default metadata provider (the class) reads the display name of an object. 此顯示名稱由驗證提供者時，它會建立驗證錯誤訊息。This display name is used by the validation provider when it creates a validation error message.

Protected Sub New ()
protected: AssociatedMetadataProvider();

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，初始化衍生自 類別之類別的新執行個體。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the class that derives from the class.

Protected MustOverride Function CreateMetadata (attributes As IEnumerable(Of Attribute), containerType As Type, modelAccessor As Func(Of Object), modelType As Type, propertyName As String) As ModelMetadata

protected: abstract System::Web::ModelBinding::ModelMetadata ^ CreateMetadata(System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<Attribute ^> ^ attributes, Type ^ containerType, Func<System::Object ^> ^ modelAccessor, Type ^ modelType, System::String ^ propertyName);

param.name: containerType
param.span: 容器的型別，如果沒有任何容器，則為。

span.span: The type of the container, or if there is no container.

param.name: propertyName
param.span: 屬性的名稱，或者為 （如果該模型不是一個屬性）。

span.span: The name of the property, or if the model is not a property.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，建立模型的中繼資料。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates metadata for a model.

summary.span: 可讓衍生類別篩選屬性的清單。

span.span: Enables derived classes to filter the list of attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的程式碼基底類別傳回的所有屬性。The code in the base class returns all attributes. 這個方法可讓您篩選屬性的衍生的類別。This method lets derived classes filter the attributes.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回所有屬性的中繼資料。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns metadata for all properties.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回指定的屬性的中繼資料。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns metadata for a specified property.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回屬性描述項物件所指定的屬性的中繼資料。

returns.span: 指定之屬性的中繼資料。

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回模型型別的中繼資料。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns metadata for the model type.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會傳回指定的型別的描述元物件。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns a descriptor object for a specified type.
